keyFeatures.title: Your Best Customers Deserve More
keyFeatures.description: Restaurants thrive when they own their online ordering system. Here's why your best customersâ€”and your businessâ€”benefit from it.

features.tag: Next-gen solutions designed to help you grow revenue
features.title: Next-gen solutions designed to help you grow revenue

0.title: Capture 100% of customers, no marketing opt-in needed
0.description: Advanced analytics drives data-backed decisions, offering predictive insights, personalized recommendations, real-time analysis, cost savings, and risk reduction. Choose advanced analytics for strategic decision-making and business growth.

1.title: Get a true customer retention health score
1.description: Go beyond revenue tracking to understand the health of your restaurant's customer base. By capturing unique profiles for every visitor, you'll have a clear view of your retention score, offering an accurate snapshot of how often customers return and the strength of their loyalty.

2.title: Collect contacts to power database marketing
2.description: Effortlessly grow your contact list as customers redeem rewards by scanning a QR code on their receipts. Once added, you can send targeted updates, exclusive offers, or e-store promotions to keep your restaurant top-of-mind.
2.imageAlt: Phone scanning QR code on receipt

3.title: Drive repeat visits with targeted, redeemable offers
3.description: Encourage repeat purchases with tailored, redeemable rewards. Set thresholds, such as minimum spending, to trigger exclusive return offers that entice customers back, keeping them engaged and driving loyalty.

operations.description: Our next-gen payment terminal is designed to meet your business needs and keep operations running smoothly.

hero.title: Stop Overpaying for Reservations - Ditch Monthly Fees and High Commission Costs
hero.description: Affordable pricing that helps restaurants save more on reservation costs every day, while driving more sales.

affordableSection.title: An Affordable Reservation System with No Catches
affordableSection.description: Most reservation systems cost more than they're worth. Oddle Reserve is differentâ€”no subscription fees, no hidden charges, just simple pay-as-you-go pricing.

0.title: Low-Cost, Pay-As-You-Go Pricing
0.description: Only pay for the reservations you accept.

1.title: Revenue-Driving, For Every Booking
1.description: Turn reservations into repeat customers with built-in engagement tools.

2.title: Built for Restaurants Like Yours:
2.description: Tailored solutions for every stage of your business.

useCases.title: Built for Every Type of Restaurant

0.title: Traditional Restaurants Going Digital
0.description: Facing digitalization challenges as the next generation takes over, but hesitant about costly subscriptions? Oddle Reserve's pay-as-you-go model smooths the transition, eliminating hefty monthly fees.
0.imageAlt: Dim sum dishes on a table representing traditional restaurants

1.title: Restaurants with High Walk-In Traffic
1.description: With high walk-in traffic and limited online reservations, managing large group bookings can be challenging. Oddle Reserve's pay-as-you-go ensures you only pay when you need to, making it an ideal solution for occasional but crucial online bookings.
1.imageAlt: Exterior of a soup restaurant representing high walk-in restaurants

2.title: Restaurants Relying on High-Commission Marketplaces
2.description: Paying hefty per-cover fees to marketplaces that hijack direct bookings with ads can be frustrating. Oddle Reserve removes commissions and charges only per reservationâ€”not per coverâ€”putting you back in control of your bookings.
2.imageAlt: Interior of a PizzaExpress restaurant representing restaurants on marketplaces

0.title: List View
0.description: See all your reservations clearly at a glance.

1.title: Timeline View
1.description: Visualize your bookings chronologically for better planning.

2.title: Table View
2.description: Manage table assignments and status efficiently.

3.title: Mobile View
3.description: Access and manage reservations on the go, from any device.

system.title: A Secure and Reliable Reservation System
system.description: Ensure reservation commitment and minimize no-shows with built-in security measures.

0.title: Secure and Reliable Reservation System
0.description: Ensure reservation commitment and minimize no-shows with built-in security measures.
0.item1: Credit Card Hold: Secure bookings by holding credit card details to reduce cancellations.
0.item2: Payment Request: Collect deposits or full payments upfront for high-value or peak-period reservations.
0.item3: Automated Customer Confirmations: Confirm bookings automatically to save time and reduce manual effort.

1.title: Customer Friendly Features
1.description: Enhance the customer experience with convenient and flexible options.
1.item1: Customer Self-Edit Reservations: Allow customers to modify or cancel reservations without needing to call, creating a smoother experience.
1.item2: Automated Status Management: Effortlessly update and track reservation statuses, minimizing manual effort and keeping your team aligned and operations smooth.

guestFeatures.description: Oddle gathers all your data in one convenient location, giving you easy access to information on dietary needs, customer visits, and interactions across different outlets. With just a click, you can view a comprehensive customer history, helping you understand and serve your guests better.

PricingPage.heroTitle: Grow Your Restaurant Revenue With One Platform
PricingPage.heroSubtitle: Start taking online orders, accepting reservations, processing offline payments, and building customer loyalty from day one â€” with no upfront costs and pay only as you serve your customers.
PricingPage.heroImageAlt: Stylized image representing restaurant growth or Oddle platform
PricingPage.benefitUnifiedPlatform: Unified Platform for Orders, Reservations & More
PricingPage.explanationDesc1: We believe in transparent, usage-based pricing. You only pay for what you use, making it cost-effective to grow your restaurant.
PricingPage.explanationDesc2: No long-term contracts, no hidden fees. Scale your usage as your needs evolve, giving you the flexibility to grow at your own pace.
PricingPage.freeProductsDesc: Every Oddle account comes with these powerful features at no extra cost:
